title: Sam Fender Wins 2025 Mercury Prize For People Watching
caption: 🏆🎉 Sam Fender takes home the Mercury Prize for his stellar album 'People Watching'! Time to celebrate! 🎶🥳 #SamFender #MercuryPrize
